src:
Lawan Tim Medioker Portugal, Arsenal Hanya Bisa Bikin Satu Shot On Target
07 Nov 2019, 12:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal beruntung bisa membawa pulang satu poin dalam lawatan ke kandang Vitoria Guimareas, matchday 4 Grup F Liga Europa 2019/20, Rabu (6/11/2019) malam WIB. Tim asuhan Unai Emery itu hanya bisa bermain imbang 1-1.
Laga tersebut terkunci hampir sepenuhnya. Arsenal baru bisa memecah kebuntuan lewat gol Shkodran Mustafi di menit ke-80. Saat tampaknya bakal menang, Arsenal justru membuat kesalahan dan membiarkan lawan menyamakan kedudukan di menit ke-90.
Hasil itu terbilang buruk, meski tak memengaruhi posisi Arsenal di klasemen sementara. The Gunners masih nyaman di puncak klasemen sementara dengan 10 poin dari 4 pertandingan.
Biar begitu, permainan Arsenal jauh di bawah standar yang seharusnya. Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Against the Portuguese Medioker Team, Arsenal Can Only Make One Shot On Target
Nov 7 2019, 12:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsenal are lucky to be able to bring home a point on a trip to Vitoria Guimareas's cage, Matchday 4 Group F Europa League 2019/20, Wednesday (11/06/2019) night hrs. Unai Emery's team can only draw 1-1.
The match is locked almost completely. Arsenal could only break the deadlock through Shkodran Mustafi's goal in the 80th minute. When it seems to be winning, Arsenal actually make mistakes and let the opponents equalize in the 90th minute.
The result was fairly bad, although it did not affect Arsenal's position in the standings. The Gunners are still comfortable at the top of the standings with 10 points from 4 matches.
Even so, Arsenal's game is far below the standard it should be. Read below, Bolaneters!
